name: Eject Button
description: Quickly move in a designated direction.

name: Fluffy Tail
description: Incapacitate a wild pokemon and increase damage dealt to it.

name: Full Heal
description: Remove all status conditions and become immune to hindrances for a short time. (2.5s duration)

name: Goal Getter
description: Doubles goal scoring speed for a short time. (10s duration)

name: Potion
description: Restores some of your HP. (15% max HP)

name: Slow Smoke
description: Create a ring of smoke around you, greatly slowing enemies within. (1s duration)

name: X Attack
description: Raises your Attack and Sp. Attack for a short time. (7s duration â€“ 20% increased Attack/Sp. Attack)

name: X Speed
description: Raises your movement speed and become immune to move speed reduction for a short time. (6s duration)
